name: We Have To Dig Deeper
description:
Welcome aboard the platform that goes deep into the depths of our planet, enjoy the ride, but beware of the slimes that will attack you!

Сontrol

Use   or  to move.

Press  or    to heal.

Press or  to attack with a dagger

The store is needed to buy bread for coins.

Coins are dropped from enemies.

Bread is needed for a quick heal
